short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle between dark mode and light mode with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Dark Mode Toggle Chrome Extension allows users to easily switch between dark mode and light mode on websites with a single click. This extension is designed to enhance the browsing experience by providing a more comfortable and eye-friendly view, especially during night-time or in low-light environments.

Features:
- Toggles dark mode and light mode with a single click on the extension icon.
- Automatically switches between dark and light mode icons to indicate the current mode.
- Works on most websites, including those with complex structures and custom styles.
- Excludes images, pictures, and videos from inversion to maintain their original appearance.

Please note that while this extension works on a wide range of websites, it may not cover all cases, and the appearance of some elements may not be perfect. Additionally, modifying the appearance of certain websites may violate their terms of service, so proceed with caution.

To use the Dark Mode Toggle Chrome Extension, simply click on the extension icon while browsing a website. The extension will toggle between dark mode and light mode, adjusting the background color, text color, and other elements to provide a more comfortable viewing experience.
